# Action needed: We can't process a document for your request for a Board Appeal

Dear <redacted>,

You submitted a request for a Board Appeal (VA Form 10182) on <redacted>, but we had a problem with our system. We couldn't upload your supporting document. We're sorry about this.

> ## Here's the file name of the document we need
> <redacted>
>
> For your privacy, we're showing only part of the file name here.

## What to do next
You'll need to submit your supporting document again. Make a copy of the document, write your Social Security number on it, and submit it by mail or in person.

### Option 1: By mail
Mail the copy of the supporting document to this address:

(address)Board of Veterans' Appeals | PO Box 27063 | Washington, D.C. 20038

### Option 2: In person
Bring the copy of the supporting document to a VA regional office.
[Find a VA regional office near you](https://www.va.gov/find-locations/)

### Option 3: By fax
Fax the supporting document to 844-678-8979.

If we need more information after we receive your document, we'll contact you.

## What to do if you have questions
Call us at 800-827-1000 (TTY: 711). We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.

Thank you

<hr>

You're receiving this email because you submitted a form on VA.gov. Don't reply to this email.
